summary: I HAVE A 2000 JEEP CHEROKEE SPORT AND THE AIRBAG LIGHT STAYS ON NOW. I TOOK IT TO THE DEALER AND THEY SAY I NEED TO PAY FOR A 300.00 CLOCK SPRING PART TO FIX IT. I CHECKED THE COMPUTER AND SEEN NUMEROUS PROBLEMS WITH THE JEEP AIRBAGS NOT WORKING. HAS THERE BEEN A RECALL ON THEM? AND IF NOT IF THERE'S BEEN SO MANY CASES OF PROBLEMS WITH THEM NOT WORKING CORRECTLY IS THERE ANYTHING BEING DONE TO PROTECT THE CONSUMER? THANK YOU
